snippet: Former Mayor Richard M. Daley of Chicago was hospitalized in an intensive care unit Saturday after feeling ill the night before while returning to Illinois from a business trip in Arizona.
lead_paragraph: Former Mayor Richard M. Daley of Chicago was hospitalized in an intensive care unit Saturday after feeling ill the night before while returning to Illinois from a business trip in Arizona.

headline.main: Feeling Ill, Richard Daley, Former Mayor of Chicago, Is in I.C.U.
headline.print_headline: Ex-Mayor Of Chicago Is in I.C.U. For Testing
